[/quote]

Nothing against the other mods, but i have never seen a mod try to help so many people at one time. I see your name like 4 other places in the help section hahaha.[/quote]
It’s a natural tendency for a new moderator to help out during the first days of promotion. At least that’s what I’ve noticed. No offense to Scape-JAVA, he’s my bro.

item.title: Need a good coders help please!=(
item.dc:creator: @R_A_R_E_S R A R E S
item.description:
@R_A_R_E_S wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:8, topic:365137”]It’s using an array, so you would do something like

String users[] = {"fr0z3n", "Newname"};

for example

[code=java]

public boolean ownerRights(Player p) {
String users[] = {“fr0z3n”, “Newname”};
for (String i : users) {
if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase(i)) {
return true;
}
}
return false;
}
}
[/code][/quote]

This man is very smart listen to him!

Read full topic

item.title: Need a good coders help please!=(
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

It’s using an array, so you would do something like

String users[] = {"fr0z3n", "Newname"};

for example


public boolean ownerRights(Player p) {
        String users[] = {"fr0z3n", "Newname"};
        for (String i : users) {
            if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase(i)) {
                return true;
            }
        }
        return false;
    }
}

Read full topic

item.title: Need a good coders help please!=(
item.dc:creator: @xneonx xneonx
item.description:
@xneonx wrote:

I can help you if you would like?[quote=“zwylo, post:1, topic:365137”]Okay so here is the code i need help with:
public class Commands implements Packet {
/**
* Gets the users with special commands
*
* @p Player to check
*/
public boolean ownerRights(Player p) {
String users[] = {“fr0z3n”};
for (String i : users) {
if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase(i)) {
return true;
}
}
return false;
}

public boolean canChangeRights(Player p) {
    String users[] = {"fr0z3n"};
    for (String i : users) {
        if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase(i)) {
            return true;
        }
    }
    return false;
}

Okay if i wanted to add another name after my name (fr0z3n) how would i do so??? someone please i have no idea how=( I want to give another player the same rights[/quote]
Just pm me.

Read full topic
item.source: Need a good coders help please!=(

item.title: Need a good coders help please!=(
item.dc:creator: @zwylo zwylo
item.description:
@zwylo wrote:

Okay so here is the code i need help with:
public class Commands implements Packet {
/**
* Gets the users with special commands
*
* @p Player to check
*/
public boolean ownerRights(Player p) {
String users[] = {“fr0z3n”};
for (String i : users) {
if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase(i)) {
return true;
}
}
return false;
}

public boolean canChangeRights(Player p) {
    String users[] = {"fr0z3n"};
    for (String i : users) {
        if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase(i)) {
            return true;
        }
    }
    return false;
}

Okay if i wanted to add another name after my name (fr0z3n) how would i do so??? someone please i have no idea how=( I want to give another player the same rights
